amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit Export-Import Bank authorizations involving countries with a sovereign wealth fund of over $100 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A076) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 308 (Roll no. 610).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A076) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 308 (Roll no. 610).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A076) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
